notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: For those interested in the original data used for these analyses, please contact India Richter, MSPH, Research and Program Manager supporting various projects at the UCLA Fielding School of Public Healthâ€”she was not involved in this study and is not an author. Data from Cambodia are available in Khmer; data from Peru are available in a mixture of Spanish and English. She can be reached at: irichter@mednet.ucla.edu.
